Language.name: objective-c
Language.keyword: \b(?: auto | break | case | char | const | continue | default | do | double | else | enum | extern | float | for | goto | if | int | long | register | return | short | signed | sizeof | static | struct | switch | typedef | union | unsigned | void | volatile | while )\b
\b(?: id | self | super | _cmd | Class | SEL | IMP | bycopy | byref | in | out | inline | inout | oneway | nil | Nil | BOOL | YES | NO )\b
Language.preprocessor: \x23 \s* (?: ifdef | ifndef | if | else | elif | endif | define | undef | warning | error | line | pragma | include | import)
